name: the-lounge
description: The Lounge is a self-hosted, always-online web IRC client. It keeps you connected to IRC networks and provides a modern multi-user interface, letting you access chat from any device using a browser.
features: Always-online: Stay connected to IRC networks 24/7 even when your browser is closed.
Multi-user: Support multiple users with individual accounts, connections, and preferences on one server.
Web-based: Access IRC from any device using a modern web browser without installing client software.
Message history: Scroll back through message history that persists across sessions and devices.
Push notifications: Receive notifications for mentions and private messages even when not actively viewing.
File uploads: Share files and images directly in channels with automatic hosting and preview generation.
Link previews: View automatic previews for shared links including images, videos, and website metadata.
Multiple networks: Connect to multiple IRC networks simultaneously from a single interface.
Responsive design: Use on desktop, tablet, or mobile with a touch-friendly responsive interface.
Themes: Customize appearance with built-in themes or create your own for personalized styling.
Search: Find messages across channels and networks using full-text search with filters.
SASL authentication: Connect securely to IRC networks using SASL for authenticated connections.
